{"step_by_step_thinking": "Resilient silicone denture lining materials are not superior to plasticized acrylic resin in terms of bond strength with a denture, so option A is incorrect. They do not remain resilient for only a short time, so option B is also incorrect. While it's true that they do not support fungal growth, this is not the primary reason they are superior, so option C is incorrect. The main advantage of resilient silicone denture lining materials over plasticized acrylic resin is that they adapt better to the tissues in the mouth, providing a more comfortable fit for the wearer.", "answer_choice": "D"}
